<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/members/{memberId}/password"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update the password of a specific member.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"memberId","description":"The identifier of the member.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"password":{"type":"string","description":"The new password for the member."}},"title":"MemberPassword"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"Member password updated successfully."},"401":{"description":"The request requires user authentication.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Detailed error message."}},"title":"ErrorMessage"}}}},"403":{"description":"The server understood the request, but refuses to authorize it.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Detailed error message."}},"title":"ErrorMessage"}}}},"404":{"description":"The specified resource was not found.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string","description":"Detailed error message."}},"title":"ErrorMessage"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
